question.content: Its really great chance to talk with dev team and also great chance to take suggestions and feedbacks. Actually, are you change and develop game with player ideas or did you planned whole road map already? One more thing, how do you feel with all this good and excited reactions ☺️❤️

answer.content: There are some things that we already have planned and roadmapped, but there are also things that folks are clearly really excited about. One of the cool things about game development is that we can always pivot based upon feedback. It's been incredible to see the reception so far ❤️
